divs: Sighting Detailsat approximately 7:15 i went to the local gas station on broadway in farmington new mexico, after getting gasoline and paying for it i went inside to get a snack and visit with the 2 gentleman i met at that gas station weeks prior. we stepped outside for a cigarette at 7:41 p.m. and i noticed an odd triangular shape coming across the sky about 200-500 ft off the ground. i was frozen in a trance on this and my friend said "dude do you see that". i answered "thank god its not only me who sees this". it seemed to have split into 2 objects or perhaps the second became visible as it was passing us.i grabbed my camera phone to take a picture but the object began a vertical assent to approx 10k ft. once it climbed to that hieght it hovered there for about 10 minutes we kept looking up at it until it disappeared into a dark gray storm cloud. i am still creeped out about this as i have never experienced anything like this and the picture i took with my mobile phone is just a gray screen with nothing in the picture.i came back to the hotel and imediately logged onto facebook and asked a friend about UFO's and was recommended to this website to report as the experience was still fresh in my mind. i was skeptical of the Aztec new mexico lore of UFO's until now.....
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Farmington
There were no other sightings in Farmington on or around July 31st 2010
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: Wierd unidentifiable object in Farmington, New Mexico.
